factoryAudits.title: Factory audits
factoryAudits.description: Validate compliance, capacity, and social responsibility before production kicks off.

inlineInspection.title: Inline inspections
inlineInspection.description: Mid-production checkpoints that surface defects early and keep launch schedules on track.

preShipment.title: Pre-shipment QC
preShipment.description: Final random inspections with bilingual reporting before containers depart China.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: Seasoned QA directors with 15+ years embedded in China’s manufacturing hubs.

presence.title: China footprint
presence.description: Inspectors across Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Ningbo, Qingdao, Wenzhou, and inland clusters.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: ISO-trained teams fluent in CPSIA, CE, REACH, and retailer-specific protocols.

inspectors.title: Field inspectors
inspectors.description: Join our nationwide network delivering hands-on inspections for global brands.

specialists.title: Quality specialists
specialists.description: Bilingual analysts who turn defect data into supplier action plans.

openRoles.title: All open roles
openRoles.description: Explore operations, client success, and technology positions worldwide.

hero.heading2: Independent product and factory audits empowering growing brands to deliver verified quality worldwide.

sample.title: Preview an inspection report
sample.description: See the defect matrix, annotated photography, and compliance summary your team receives within 48 hours.
sample.meta: Includes bilingual commentary and geo-tagged findings.

speed.label: Report turnaround
speed.description: Bilingual findings, defect coding, and compliance notes delivered within two business days.

inspectors.label: Inspectors nationwide
inspectors.description: Trusted auditors positioned across Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Ningbo, Qingdao, and inland clusters.

checkpoints.label: Checklist points
checkpoints.description: Category-specific SOPs covering consumer electronics, apparel, and home goods.

bullets.quality: Expert inspectors on site across Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Ningbo, and more.
bullets.speed: 48-hour turnaround for reports, aligned with your production milestones.
bullets.coverage: Multi-category coverage including consumer electronics, apparel, and home goods.
bullets.compliance: Compliance guidance aligned with North American and European regulations.

pillars.title: Why brands choose Nayuta
pillars.intro: Every program pairs field-proven inspectors with transparent reporting, so your teams gain certainty from factory floor to final shipment.

expertise.title: Specialist expertise
expertise.description: Local inspectors with lab partnerships and category-specific checklists built for complex supply chains.

visibility.title: Full visibility
visibility.description: Mobile-ready dashboards, detailed defect coding, and bilingual commentary for every inspection.

partnership.title: Embedded partnership
partnership.description: Program design workshops, vendor training, and escalation paths aligned with your regional teams.

resilience.title: Program resilience
resilience.description: Scalable network of inspectors ready to ramp with seasonal demand and new product launches.

footer.description: Independent inspection partner supporting global brands with bilingual teams, deep supply-chain insight, and trusted on-the-ground coverage across China.

seo.title: Nayuta Inspection | Independent Inspection Services
seo.description: Inspection in China for global brands: on-site quality control, factory audits, and compliance assurance delivered by bilingual experts.
seo.ogDescription: Empowering global brands with reliable, independent product inspections and audits throughout China.
seo.serviceType: Independent third-party inspection for global brands
